paper_abstract: Application of Cohen's weighted kappa for inter-rater agreement requires the specification of a weighting matrix. An explicit formula for the determinants of the principal minors of the weighting matrix with Cicchetti-Allison weights is derived. Since all determinants are strictly positive, it follows that the Cicchetti-Allison weighting matrix is positive definite. (C) 2012 Elsevier B.V. All rights reserved.
paper_title: The Cicchetti-Allison weighting matrix is positive definite
